name: FishFish
description: A REST API focused on cybersecurity, providing resources for early detection of phishing domains and URLs to enhance safety across Discord communities

about.overview: FishFish API is a volunteer-driven cybersecurity project that provides developers with tools to detect phishing domains and URLs, offering real-time updates via WebSocket and integration with Discord for scam prevention.
features: Early detection of phishing domains and URLs
WebSocket feed for live database updates
API key authentication for anti-abuse measures
useCases: Enhancing Discord bot security with phishing detection
Automating threat intelligence for web applications
Integrating real-time phishing data into cybersecurity tools

endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of known phishing domains
Check if a specific URL is associated with phishing activity

quickStart: Join the FishFish Discord server and run the /key command to obtain an API key
Use the API key in the Authorization header for requests
Make a GET request to https://api.fishfish.gg/v1/domains to fetch phishing domains

authentication.description: Include your API key in the Authorization header for authenticated requests. Obtain a key via the /key command in the FishFish Discord server.
